alert.note: Alert for Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 05 at 1:06PM PST until January 06 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST SATURDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SATURDAY TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph expected, and isolated gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Saturday. For the High Wind Warning, from 7 PM Saturday to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
